titles.title: College Savings Protection Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that distributions from qualified State tuition programs which are used to pay educational expenses shall not be includible in gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/30/2001--Introduced. College Savings Protection Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise provisions concerning distributions from State tuition programs to provide for the exclusion from gross income of distributions used for the payment of qualified higher education expenses.
